Measurement.Description: LTE Cell Load measurement (M8001) measures packet scheduling related measurements.

Counter.NEName: PDCP SDU delay on DL DTCH Min
Counter.Description: The minimum retention period for a PDCP SDU (DL) inside the eNB. UPDATED: At the first transmission of a TB containing a segment of the SDU.

Counter.NEName: Average number of RRC connected UEs per cell
Counter.Description: This measurement provides the average number of RRC connected UEs, that is UEs in RRC_CONNECTED state. The reported value is 100 times higher than the actual value (for example 1.00 is stored as 100). UPDATED: After change of number of RRC connected UEs.
Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.

Measurement.Description: S1 Interface measurement (M8000) measures GTP protocol procedures on user plane.

Counter.NEName: Initial Context Setup requests
Counter.Description: The number of Initial Context Setup Requests. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Request message sent by the MME to eNB.

Counter.NEName: Initial Context Setup completions
Counter.Description: The number of successful Initial Context Setup completions. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME for the successful Initial Context Setup completion.

Counter.NEName: Initial Context Setup failures due to Radio Network Layer cause
Counter.Description: The number of Initial Context Setup failures the cause of which is the Radio Network Layer UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME for the failed Initial Context Setup. The transmission of the S1AP: Initial Context Setup Failure to MME if the Initial Context Setup procedure has failed and the cause is bearer-independent

Counter.NEName: Initial Context Setup failures due to Transport Layer cause
Counter.Description: The number of Initial Context Setup failures the cause of which is the Transport Layer. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME for the failed Initial Context Setup. Transmission of an S1AP: Initial Context Setup Failure to the MME if the Initial Context Setup procedure has failed and the cause is bearer-independent.

Counter.NEName: Initial Context Setup failures due to Resource reasons
Counter.Description: The number of Initial Context Setup failures because of Resource reasons. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME for the failed Initial Context Setup. The transmission of an S1AP: Initial Context Setup Failure message to MME if the Initial Context Setup procedure has failed and the cause is bearer-independent.

Counter.NEName: Initial Context Setup failures due to Other reasons
Counter.Description: The number of Initial Context Setup failures because of Other reasons. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME for the failed Initial Context Setup. The transmission of an S1AP: Initial Context Setup Failure to the MME if the Initial Context Setup procedure has failed and the cause is bearer-independent The counter is updated if the failure detected does not match any other counter failure.

Counter.NEName: S1 setup requests
Counter.Description: The number of S1 Setup Requests. UPDATED: This counter is updated when eNB transmits an S1AP:S1 Setup Request message to MME.

Counter.NEName: S1 setup completions
Counter.Description: The number of S1 Setup completions. UPDATED: This counter is updated when eNB receives an S1AP:S1 Setup Response message sent by MME

Counter.NEName: S1 setup failure No response from MME
Counter.Description: The number of S1 Setup failures due to no response from MME. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the timer expires.

Counter.NEName: S1 setup failure due to MME rejection
Counter.Description: The number of S1 Setup failures due to a failure indication from MME. UPDATED: This counter is updated when eNB receives an S1AP:S1 Setup Failure message sent by MME

Counter.NEName: S1 Paging requests
Counter.Description: The number of S1 paging requests. UPDATED: This counter is updated when eNB receives an S1AP:Paging message sent by MME.

Counter.NEName: Number of UE-associated logical S1-connection establishments
Counter.Description: The establishment of UE-associated logical S1-connection is initiated by the reception of the first NAS signaling message within the RRC Connection Establishment. UPDATED: Transmission of the S1AP message INITIAL UE MESSAGE containing the first NAS signaling message to the MME.

Counter.NEName: Global S1 Reset initiated by the eNB
Counter.Description: The number of S1 Full Reset messages initiated either by eNB UPDATED: Transmission of a global S1AP: RESET Message

Counter.NEName: Global S1 Reset initiated by the MME
Counter.Description: The number of S1 Full Reset messages initiated by MME UPDATED: Reception of a global S1AP:RESET Message sent by MME to the eNB.

Counter.NEName: Partial S1 Reset initiated by the eNB
Counter.Description: The number of S1 Partial Reset messages initiated either by eNB UPDATED: Transmission of a partial S1AP: RESET Message

Counter.NEName: Partial S1 Reset initiated by the MME
Counter.Description: The number of S1 Partial Reset messages initiated by MME UPDATED: Reception of a partial S1AP:RESET Message sent by MME to the eNB.

Counter.NEName: E-RAB setup completions
Counter.Description: The number of successful E-RAB Setup Completions UPDATED: Transmission of a S1AP:E-RAB Setup Response message sent by eNB to MME when E-RAB Setup List is not empty

Counter.NEName: E-RAB setup failures due to radio network layer problems
Counter.Description: The number of successful E-RAB Setup Failures due to radio network layer problems UPDATED: Transmission of a S1AP:E-RAB Setup Response message sent by eNB to MME when reason for at least one bearer is radio network layer problems

Counter.NEName: E-RAB setup failures due to transport layer problems
Counter.Description: The number of successful E-RAB Setup Failures due to transport layer problems UPDATED: Transmission of a S1AP:E-RAB Setup Response message sent by eNB to MME when reason for at least one bearer is transport layer problems

Counter.NEName: E-RAB setup failures due to resource problems
Counter.Description: The number of successful E-RAB Setup Failures due to resource problems UPDATED: Transmission of a S1AP:E-RAB Setup Response message sent by eNB to MME when reason for at least one bearer is resource problems

Counter.NEName: E-RAB setup failures due to other reasons
Counter.Description: The number of successful E-RAB Setup Failures due to other reasons UPDATED: Transmission of a S1AP:E-RAB Setup Response message sent by eNB to MME when reason for at least one bearer is other than radio network layer problems, transport layer problems, resource problems

Counter.NEName: E-RAB setup requests
Counter.Description: The number of E-RAB Setup Requests UPDATED: Reception of a S1AP:E-RAB Setup Request message in eNB. Message is sent by MME.

Counter.NEName: UE Context modification attempts
Counter.Description: The number of UE context modification attempts UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB irrespective of the modified information.

Counter.NEName: UE Context modification attempts due to AMBR
Counter.Description: The number of UE context modification attempts due to UE-AMBR modification UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB in case that this message contains the UE-AMBR value.

Counter.NEName: UE Context modification failures
Counter.Description: The number of UE context modification failures UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION FAILURE message sent by eNB to MME.

Counter.NEName: Number of failed WRITE-REPLACE WARNING procedures
Counter.Description: This measurement provides the number of failed WRITE-REPLACE WARNING procedures. The procedure is regarded as failed when there is no eNB cell for which the Warning Message handling has been successfully initiated. UPDATED: The counter is incremented when an S1AP:WRITE-REPLACE WARNING RESPONSE message is sent to the MME and the Broadcast Completed Area List IE is not included.

Counter.NEName: Number of failed KILL procedures
Counter.Description: Number of failed KILL procedures. The procedure is regarded as failed when the cancellation of the indicated Warning Message has not been initiated for at least one cell of the eNB. UPDATED: The counter is incremented when an S1AP:KILL RESPONSE message is sent to the MME and the Broadcast Cancelled Area List IE is not included.

Counter.NEName: Number of Uplink NAS Transport messages
Counter.Description: The number of Uplink NAS Transport messages sent to MME. UPDATED: This counter is updated at the transmission of an S1AP: UPLINK NAS TRANSPORT message to the MME.

Counter.NEName: Number of Downlink NAS Transport messages
Counter.Description: The number of Downlink NAS Transport messages received by the eNB. UPDATED: This counter is updated following the reception of an S1AP: DOWNLINK NAS TRANSPORT message sent by the MME to the eNB.

Counter.NEName: UE Context modification attempts due to CS Fallback
Counter.Description: The number of UE Context modification attempts due to CS Fallback UPDATED: This counter is updated following the reception of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message sent by the MME to the eNB in case that this message contains the CS Fallback Indicator (3GPP TS 36.413, TS 23.272).

Counter.NEName: E-RAB Setup Requests for IMS emergency sessions
Counter.Description: The number of E-RAB Setup Requests for IMS emergency sessions UPDATED: Reception of the S1AP: E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message (eNB <- MME) in case that this message contains the ARP (Allocation and Retention Priority) priority level which is used for emergency sessions (3GPP TS 36.413)

Counter.NEName: E-RAB Setup Completions for IMS emergency sessions
Counter.Description: The number of E-RAB Setup Completions for IMS emergency sessions UPDATED: Transmission of the S1AP: E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message (eNB -> MME) in case that this message contains the E-RAB ID of the IMS emergency session in the E-RAB Setup List AND was sent in response to the reception of the S1AP: E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message (eNB <- MME) containing the ARP (Allocation and Retention Priority) priority level which is used for emergency sessions (3GPP TS 36.413).

Counter.NEName: E-RAB setup failures for IMS emergency sessions due to to missing RB (Radio Bearer) resources
Counter.Description: The number of E-RAB setup failures for IMS emergency sessions due to to missing RB (Radio Bearer) resources UPDATED: Transmission of the S1AP: E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message (eNB -> MME) in case that this message contains the E-RAB ID of the IMS emergency session in the E-RAB Failed to Setup List (because of missing RB (Radio Bearer) resources) AND was sent in response to the reception of the S1AP: E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message (eNB <- MME) containing the ARP (Allocation and Retention Priority) priority level which is used for emergency sessions (3GPP TS 36.413).

Counter.NEName: Number of Location Reporting Control messages
Counter.Description: The number of Location Reporting Control messages received from MME per eNB. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP: LOCATION REPORTING CONTROL message sent by MME to the eNB.

Counter.NEName: Number of Location Report messages
Counter.Description: The number of Location Report messages sent to MME per eNB. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP: LOCATION REPORT message to the MME.

Counter.NEName: Number of successful X2 IP address retrievals via S1
Counter.Description: This counter provides the number of successful X2 IP address retrievals of a neighbor eNB via S1 UPDATED: Reception of S1AP:MME CONFIGURATION TRANSFER including 'SON Information Reply' with 'X2 TNL Configuration Info' - (3GPP TS 36.413)

Counter.NEName: Number of attempted X2 IP address retrievals via S1
Counter.Description: This counter provides the number of attempts initiated by eNB to retrieve the X2 IP address of a neighbor eNB via S1. UPDATED: Transmission of S1AP:ENB CONFIGURATION TRANSFER including 'SON Information Request' for 'X2 TNL Configuration Info'. - (3GPP TS 36.413)

Counter.NEName: Number of WRITE-REPLACE WARNING REQUEST messages
Counter.Description: Number of S1AP:WRITE-REPLACE WARNING REQUEST messages received from MME. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an S1AP:WRITE-REPLACE WARNING REQUEST message is received from MME.

Counter.NEName: Number of WRITE-REPLACE WARNING RESPONSE messages
Counter.Description: Number of S1AP:WRITE-REPLACE WARNING RESPONSE messages sent to MME. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an S1AP:WRITE-REPLACE WARNING RESPONSE message is sent to MME.

Counter.NEName: Number of KILL REQUEST messages
Counter.Description: Number of S1AP:KILL REQUEST messages received from MME. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an S1AP:KILL REQUEST message is received from MME.

Counter.NEName: Number of KILL RESPONSE messages
Counter.Description: Number of S1AP:KILL RESPONSE messages sent to MME. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an S1AP:KILL RESPONSE message is sent to MME.
Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
